bug.description:

These four models fail to fit when setting batch_size to 4:
DRMM MatchPyramid CDSSM DSSM

Set to 4 when running tests. See <denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.org/NTMC-Community/MatchZoo/jobs/515104537>this CI run</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe your attempts</denchmark-h>
I checked the documentation and found no answer I checked to make sure that this is not a duplicate issue
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
OS [e.g. Windows 10, macOS 10.14]: macOS 10.14 Hardware [e.g. CPU only, GTX 1080 Ti]: CPU

comments.comment: tried to set batch_size to 4 on ubuntu 18.04, can not reproduce the error (dssm & cdssm).
I hope things are working well for you now. I’ll go ahead and close this issue, but I’m happy to continue further discussion whenever needed.
